ygData.subject: Re: Windows - Sorry I know its not supported
ygData.msgSnippet: cool, that was easy. sorry, but now to the next problem, I ve gone through it several times, and I can t figure out if I am doing something dumb. Any help

cool, that was easy.

sorry, but now to the next problem, I've gone through it several
times, and I can't figure out if I am doing something dumb. Any help
would be very nice.

After I go through the steps in the manual, ie submit the job and
change the agent headers, and then say start pending jobs I get this
error in the UI:

A fatal InitializationException occured when loading job:
Unable to setup crawl modules: java.lang.ClassCastException:
org.archive.crawler.settings.ModuleType

and the console says this:

org.archive.crawler.framework.exceptions.InitializationException:
Unable to setu
p crawl modules: java.lang.ClassCastException:
org.archive.crawler.settings.Modu
leType
        at
org.archive.crawler.framework.CrawlController.initialize(CrawlControl
ler.java:344)
        at
org.archive.crawler.admin.CrawlJobHandler.startNextJobInternal(CrawlJ
obHandler.java:1050)
        at
org.archive.crawler.admin.CrawlJobHandler$2.run(CrawlJobHandler.java:
1016)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Caused by: java.lang.ClassCastException:
org.archive.crawler.settings.ModuleType

        at
org.archive.crawler.framework.CrawlController.setupCrawlModules(Crawl
Controller.java:568)
        at
org.archive.crawler.framework.CrawlController.initialize(CrawlControl
ler.java:336)
        ... 3 more


++++++++++++++++++++

r readSettingsObject Value of illegal type:
'org.archive.crawler.settings.Module

--- In archive-crawler@yahoogroups.com, Igor Ranitovic <igor@a...> wrote:
> /admin is old UI directory layout. Try
> http://localhost:8080/index.jsp
> or just
> http://localhost:8080/
> 
> i.
> 
> > Hi Guys, 
> > 
> > Heretrix looks grand, but its the old annoying query about getting it 
> > going on windows. I have had a trawl through the message-base and 
> > oddly I can't see anyone having this same problem.
> > 
> > I startup and everything seems ok:
> > 
> > 00:58:30.468 EVENT  Starting Jetty/4.2.23
> > 00:58:30.734 EVENT  Started WebApplicationContext[/,Heritrix Console]
> > 00:58:30.890 EVENT  Started SocketListener on 0.0.0.0:8080
> > 00:58:30.890 EVENT  Started org.mortbay.jetty.Server@f84386
> > Heritrix version: 1.4.0
> > 
> > I then go to :
> > http://localhost:8080/admin
> > 
> > and I get:
> > 
> > HTTP ERROR: 404 Not Found
> > 
> > RequestURI=/admin
> > 
> > Powered by Jetty://
> > 
> > so jetty seems to be working just enough to get me an error message.
> > 
> > I truth is I don't even think I need the webui. 
> > 
> > All I want to do is crawl starting from x, and note any xml files. 
> > But can't seem to find the Command line options for doing this either.
> > 
> > any help would be grand.
> > 
> > take care
> >
